Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves and cuffs with adjustable buttoning.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves and cuffs with adjustable buttoning.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with long ties.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with long ties.

Trainers in imitation leather decorated with glittery hearts. Padded edge at the back and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Terry linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Sleeveless body in ribbed jersey with a low neckline. The body is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Long tunic in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a turtle neck, long sleeves and slits at the sides of the hem.
Trousers in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication, and wide, flared legs.
Soft velour joggers in a relaxed fit. High waist with a wide, ribbed waistband and drawstring, and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Boxy top in soft velour with low dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Slightly wider, ribbed neckline.
Wide padded satin Alice band. Width 4 cm.
Wide padded satin Alice band. Width 4 cm.

Long dress in softly draping satin in a relaxed fit with a deep V-neck front and back. Wrapover top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the neckline and narrow ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with gathers at the top and volume at the bottom, and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Trousers in a soft rib knit with a lightly brushed finish. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, and straight, wide legs.
Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a zip at the top, a quilted front with studs and a shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 5x11x16 cm.
Fitted body in soft viscose jersey. Deep V-neck with a gathered seam at the top, a deep neckline at the back, 3/4-length sleeves and a lined gusset.
Dress in matt satin with a tie belt and deep V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Sewn-in wrapover front, seam at the waist and flared skirt with a wide flounce. Unlined.
Dress in matt satin with a tie belt and deep V-neck with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Sewn-in wrapover front, seam at the waist and flared skirt with a wide flounce. Unlined.
Cropped top in soft velour with taped trims in a toning colour around the neckline and armholes, and a wide elastic hem.

Trousers geared to outdoor activity with good air permeability to wick away moisture. The trousers are made from a stretchy woven fabric for increased mobility, with a water-repellent finish on the bum and knees. Elasticated waist for added comfort, a zip fly and button, side pockets and a diagonal, zipped leg pocket for safe storage of valuables. Reinforced, wear-resistant hems with adjustable fasteners. Unlined.

Elasticated waist for added comfort, a zip fly and button, side pockets and a diagonal, zipped leg pocket for safe storage of valuables. Reinforced, wear-resistant hems with adjustable fasteners. Playsuit in a viscose and cotton weave with wide shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Patch pockets with a flap at the top, side pockets and back pockets. Seam at the waist with a soft, detachable belt with a large plastic buckle at the front. Wide legs with pleats at the top.

Ankle-length dress in woven fabric with inset lace trims, elasticated shoulder straps and wide flounces over the shoulders. Concealed zip and a button at one side and a flared skirt. Lined at the top and a short underskirt.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections and a racer back.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft, printed jersey. Top with a round neckline, short sleeves and rounded hem. Longer at the back. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.

Long nightshirt in soft cotton flannel with notch lapels, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck, low-cut back and narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck, low-cut back and narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.

Pyjamas in soft, gently draping viscose jersey. Wide top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Wide, straight-cut bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and a lace trim at the hems.
Knee-length cycling shorts in sturdy jersey with a regular, elasticated waist, flatlock seams and a foil print.
Knee-length cycling shorts in sturdy jersey with a regular, elasticated waist, flatlock seams and a foil print.
Sleeveless body in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Low cut at the back, round, elastic shoulder straps, a lined gusset and a string back.

Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered motif on the front and an adjustable hook and loop fastener at the back. Sweatband in a cotton weave.
Fitted body in jersey with a V-neck at the front and a low-cut back. Elbow-length sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.

Cap in sequined mesh with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back and lining in a cotton weave.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with fringing at the front, a zip at the top and a braided shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 15x18 cm.

Small backpack in woven fabric with reversible sequins, a handle at the top and adjustable shoulders straps. One large compartment and one zipped outer compartment. Recycled polyester lining. Size 8x15x18 cm.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short sleeves, a tapered waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
